targets.query: SELECT last("cpu") * 100 FROM "cpustat" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY "host" fill(null) LIMIT 1
SELECT mean("memused")/mean("memtotal")*100 FROM "memory" GROUP BY host fill(null) LIMIT 1
SELECT sum(last) FROM (SELECT last(cpu) FROM cpustat WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY "host", "object" LIMIT 1 )
SELECT mean("memused")/mean("memtotal")*100 FROM "memory" WHERE $timeFilter fill(null)
SELECT mean("used")/mean("total") FROM "system" WHERE $timeFilter AND ("host" = '$storage') fill(null)
SELECT last("status") FROM "system" WHERE $timeFilter AND ("nodename" =~ /^$hostname_all$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "host" LIMIT 1
SELECT last("status") FROM "system" WHERE $timeFilter AND ("object" =~ /^qemu$/) AND ("nodename" =~ /^$hostname_all$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "host" LIMIT 1
SELECT last("status") FROM "system" WHERE $timeFilter AND ("object" =~ /^lxc$/) AND ("nodename" =~ /^$hostname_all$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "host" LIMIT 1
SELECT last("status") FROM "system" WHERE $timeFilter AND ("object" =~ /^qemu$/) AND ("nodename" =~ /^$hostname_all$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "host" LIMIT 1
SELECT last("status") FROM "system" WHERE $timeFilter AND ("object" =~ /^lxc$/) AND ("nodename" =~ /^$hostname_all$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "host" LIMIT 1
SELECT last("uptime") FROM "system" WHERE $timeFilter AND ("host" =~ /^$hostname$/)
SELECT last("cpu") FROM "cpustat" WHERE $timeFilter AND ("host" =~ /^$hostname$/)
SELECT mean("memused")/mean("memtotal")*100 FROM "memory" WHERE $timeFilter AND ("host" =~ /^$hostname$/) GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("used")/mean("total") FROM "system" WHERE ("type" = 'dir' AND "nodename" =~ /^$hostname$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("memused") / 1073741824 FROM "memory" WHERE $timeFilter AND ("host" =~ /^$hostname$/) GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("memtotal") FROM "memory" WHERE $timeFilter AND ("host" =~ /^$hostname$/) GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("memfree") FROM "memory" WHERE $timeFilter AND ("host" =~ /^$hostname$/) GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT last("uptime") AS "Uptime", "cpu" AS "Cpu %", "cpus" AS "Cpus", "mem" AS "RAM", "disk" AS "Disk", "status" AS "Status" FROM "system" WHERE ("nodename" =~ /^$hostname$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "host", "object" LIMIT 1
SELECT mean("cpu") FROM "cpustat" WHERE $timeFilter AND ("host" =~ /^$hostname$/) GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("memused")/mean("memtotal")*100 FROM "memory" WHERE $timeFilter AND ("host" =~ /^$hostname$/) GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("memtotal") AS "total", mean("memused") AS "used", mean("memfree") AS "free" FROM "memory" WHERE $timeFilter AND ("host" =~ /^$hostname$/) GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(last("receive"), 1s) *8 AS "Download", non_negative_derivative(last("transmit"), 1s) *8 AS "Upload" FROM "nics" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$hostname$/ AND "instance" =~ /^$interfaces$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("cpu") FROM "system" WHERE ("nodename" =~ /^$hostname$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "host" fill(null)
SELECT mean("mem") FROM "system" WHERE ("nodename" =~ /^$hostname$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "host" fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(last("netin"), 1s) *8 FROM "system" WHERE ("nodename" =~ /^$hostname$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "host" fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(last("netout"), 1s) *8 FROM "system" WHERE ("nodename" =~ /^$hostname$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "host" fill(null)

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM nics WITH key="instance"
list.name: interface
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM nics WITH key="instance"

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM system WITH key="nodename"
list.label: node

list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM system WITH key="nodename"

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM system WITH key="nodename"
list.name: hostname_all
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM system WITH key="nodename"

list.definition: SELECT COUNT(count) FROM ( SELECT COUNT("active") FROM "system" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY "nodename")
list.name: count_nodes
list.query: SELECT COUNT(count) FROM ( SELECT COUNT("active") FROM "system" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY "nodename")
